30:22 and he does not want to kill. 所以他不想要杀人
30:25 Of course, he turns out to be the most effective soldier. 当然 结果他成为最有战力的军人
30:29 He takes out an entire German gun emplacement. 他端掉了德军的一个机枪炮台 （《约克军曹》霍华德霍克斯）
30:33 Them guns was killing hundreds, maybe thousands, 他们的枪杀死了数百人 甚至是数千人
30:36 and there weren't nothin' anybody could do but to stop them guns. 除了阻止他们杀人以外 没有其他方法了
30:40 [Coppola] The movie slowly built its premise 电影慢慢建立其假设
30:44 that someone who could be so against killing 某个那么反对杀生的人
30:47 could ultimately also be a very effective soldier 最终也能成为最有战力的军人
30:51 if the idea behind it could make sense to him. 如果这背后的意义 对他来说有道理的话
30:55 [narrator] Sergeant York became the highest-grossing film of 1941. 《约克军曹》 成为1941年最卖座的电影
